channel.title: Comments on: Convicted kid toucher, Gary Glitter, seeks new amnesty in Vietnam

item.title: By: radiofreekevin
item.dc:creator: radiofreekevin
item.description: I still appreciate the irony when I see legions of sports fans cheering along with his music in arenas and stadiums throughout our fundamentalist nation.
item.content:encoded: I still appreciate the irony when I see legions of sports fans cheering along with his music in arenas and stadiums throughout our fundamentalist nation.
